title: Nonlinear Instructional Method-Based Physical Education and Sports Coaching Strategy Design

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Team-based project design and implementation of constraint-led approaches applicable to real physical education settings for pre-service and in-service teachers

learning_goals: Learners can explain the core principles of the constraints-led approach and apply them to real coaching scenarios.
Learners can design personalized constraints by analyzing cognitive-behavioral-perceptual interactions in sports performance contexts.
Learners can develop a nonlinear pedagogy-based training program through PBL team projects and propose methods to verify its effectiveness.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
